message: Let's be fair, 60% for me, 40% for you!
Your share is decreasing with inflation. I'm offering a more reasonable 45/55 split. Let's close the deal.
I'll give you a bit more, but I still think I deserve the bigger share. 58% for me, 42% for you.
Alice, let's be realistic. Inflation is working against you. I'm offering a 48/52 split. Take it before it gets worse!
I'll meet you halfway between our last offers. 56% for me, 44% for you. Don't make me wait!
Alice, this is it. A straight 50/50 split.  Take it before inflation eats away even more of your share!
